title: 怎么设置clearlag插件不清理自定义npcmod的npc？
author: lufei010623
txt_content: ER更好使 。。一般不用clearlag 实体也没多到那么可怕吧？

replies.author: huanxiangxiang
replies.txt_content: 标题: 怎么设置clearlag插件不清理自定义npcmod的npc？玩家不在npc旁边的时候clearlag插件就把npc清理了...

replies.author: lufei010623
replies.txt_content:

http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=415779

这个感觉清理实体更好一些 只清理密集的
